lead_paragraph: In the blue-collar, marginal district in the South of Spain, Tano, a teenager currently serving a sentence in a juvenile reform center, is given a 48-hour pass to attend his brother's wedding. Together with his best friend Richi, Tano plans to enjoy all the things he is normally prohibited from doing. More than just two days of freedom, Tano's leave turns out to be a journey into maturity.
